Great puzzles, amazing story and great co-op. 100% worth buying, one of Valve's classics.

Absolute masterpiece.

Portal 2 is one of the only games that kept me interested all the way through.

The puzzles are designed in a way that makes you feel like you're a genius, even though you did what the developers wanted you to do all along. The constant introduction of new mechanics keeps the player interested to see what else they can do with the new tools at their disposal. Just when you thought you had the mechanics figured out, the developers show you a new way to use it.

The characters make the game feel alive in a way that few other games can. During frustrating moments, I found myself not giving up only to hear more of the incredible dialog.

Play this game.
